name: FlatOut
summary: Enjoy this great racing title with a new and impressive game engine making the driving experience a thrilling ride. A destructible environment, weather and particle effects, great physics and many more features make this game one hell of a fun racing game! Use the nitro pick-ups to boost your car, drive your opponents off the track but keep an eye on your car's damage meter, if you push too hard you'll be crashing off yourself! If you like wrecking cars this is the racing game for you!
